leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 地球科学-遥感与地理空间生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→检测/分割→变化检测→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: GIS工具 + CV框架 + 数据集

queries: [WEB] remote sensing change detection evaluation github
[WEB] deep learning earth observation datasets list github

tools.name: RSICD_optimal
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized Remote Sensing Image Captioning Dataset
tools.detailed_description: Datasets for remote sensing images, specifically designed for image caption generation tasks as explored in the associated research paper.

tools.name: 3MOS
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-source Optical-SAR Image Matching Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A multi-source, multi-resolution, and multi-scene dataset designed for Optical-SAR image matching tasks.

tools.name: Fire-Detection-UAV-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Aerial Imagery Dataset for Fire Detection
tools.detailed_description: Aerial imagery dataset collected via Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAV) for fire detection, classification, and segmentation tasks.

tools.name: WHU-OPT-SAR-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Fusion Dataset for Optical and SAR Images
tools.detailed_description: Open source dataset for multimodal fusion of remote sensing optical and SAR images, suitable for deep learning applications.

tools.name: RICE_DATASET
tools.one_line_profile: Remote Sensing Image Dataset for Cloud Removal
tools.detailed_description: A dataset specifically designed for the task of cloud removal in remote sensing images.

tools.name: RSCC
tools.one_line_profile: Real-World Remote Sensing Change Caption Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dataset for remote sensing change captioning, presented at NeurIPS 2025 D&B track.

tools.name: iSAID_Devkit
tools.one_line_profile: Development Kit for iSAID Dataset
tools.detailed_description: Official development kit for the iSAID dataset (Instance Segmentation in Aerial Images), providing tools for data loading and evaluation.

tools.name: OBIC-GCN-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Annotated Datasets for Object-based Classification
tools.detailed_description: Contains annotated datasets and codes for object-based classification of remote sensing images using Graph Convolutional Networks.

tools.name: LEVIR-CC-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Remote Sensing Image Change Captioning Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset designed for remote sensing image change captioning and detection tasks.

tools.name: RSICC
tools.one_line_profile: Remote Sensing Image Change Captioning Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset for remote sensing image change captioning, associated with the Dual-Branch Transformers method.

tools.name: Text2Earth
tools.one_line_profile: Text-driven Remote Sensing Image Generation Dataset and Model
tools.detailed_description: A global-scale dataset and foundation model for text-driven remote sensing image generation.

tools.name: Clay Foundation Model
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source AI Foundation Model for Earth
tools.detailed_description: An open-source AI foundation model and interface designed for Earth observation tasks, enabling various downstream applications.

tools.name: xView Data Utilities
tools.one_line_profile: Data Processing Utilities for xView Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility scripts and tools for processing and handling the xView 2018 dataset.

tools.name: xView2 Scoring
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring Metrics for xView2 Challenge
tools.detailed_description: Reference implementation for computing scores and metrics for the xView2 Challenge, useful for evaluating building damage assessment models.

tools.name: Satellite-Image-Captioning-Model
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic Satellite Image Captioning Dataset Generator
tools.detailed_description: A project that generates captions for synthetic satellite imagery and provides a benchmark-ready dataset for environmental data captioning.

tools.name: SSGP-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Simple Spatial Gapfilling Processor
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for filling gaps in spatial datasets, such as remote sensing data, using spatial gapfilling techniques.

tools.name: EESRGAN
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End Edge-Enhanced GAN for small object detection in remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation combining Edge-Enhanced GAN and Object Detector Network specifically designed for detecting small objects in satellite imagery.

tools.name: DisasterM3
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing vision-language dataset for disaster assessment
tools.detailed_description: A multi-label, multi-task, and multi-modal dataset designed for disaster damage assessment and response using remote sensing vision-language models.

tools.name: LoveDA
tools.one_line_profile: Land-cover dataset for domain adaptive semantic segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A remote sensing land-cover dataset specifically designed for domain adaptive semantic segmentation, containing urban and rural scenes.

tools.name: HunanMultimodalDataset
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal remote sensing dataset for Hunan, China
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal remote sensing dataset comprising Sentinel-2, Sentinel-1, and SRTM data covering the Hunan province in China.

tools.name: SkySenseGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Instruction tuning dataset and model for RS vision-language understanding
tools.detailed_description: A fine-grained instruction tuning dataset and associated model designed to enhance remote sensing vision-language understanding capabilities.

tools.name: SEVIR
tools.one_line_profile: Storm Event Imagery Dataset benchmarks and tools
tools.detailed_description: Code and model benchmarks for the SEVIR dataset, enabling deep learning applications in radar and satellite meteorology for storm event analysis.

tools.name: SAR2Opt-Heterogeneous-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for SAR-to-Optical image translation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset designed for the task of translating Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) images to optical remote sensing images.

tools.name: CCExpert
tools.one_line_profile: Model for remote sensing change captioning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the CCExpert model for remote sensing change captioning, featuring difference-aware integration and a foundational dataset.

tools.name: DoTA
tools.one_line_profile: Detection of Traffic Anomaly dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dataset dedicated to the detection of traffic anomalies in video or remote sensing data, supporting research in traffic management and safety.

tools.name: gval
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for evaluating geospatial datasets
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Python framework developed by NOAA for evaluating the skill of geospatial datasets by comparing candidates to benchmark maps.

tools.name: EfficientBigEarthNet
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient training models for BigEarthNet dataset
tools.detailed_description: Code and models designed for efficient training on the BigEarthNet dataset for Land Use Land Cover (LULC) classification tasks.

tools.name: Minerva
tools.one_line_profile: Helper package for TorchGeo models and data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that aids in the fitting and testing of neural network models for land cover data, designed to work with TorchGeo datasets.

tools.name: Xview2_Strong_Baseline
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline model for xView2 building damage assessment
tools.detailed_description: A strong baseline implementation and winning model code for the xView2 'Assess Building Damage' challenge.

tools.name: RSD46-WHU
tools.one_line_profile: 46-class remote sensing image scene classification dataset
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale public dataset containing 46 classes for remote sensing image scene classification tasks.

tools.name: RSOD-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing object detection dataset
tools.detailed_description: An open dataset specifically designed for object detection tasks in remote sensing images.

tools.name: QUH-classification-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Qingdao UAV-borne Hyperspectral Image dataset
tools.detailed_description: A UAV-borne Hyperspectral Image (HSI) dataset collected in Qingdao for precise land cover classification.

tools.name: DOTA-DOAI
tools.one_line_profile: Codebase for DOTA object detection competitions
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive codebase for participating in DOTA (Dataset for Object deTection in Aerial images) related competitions, supporting rotation and horizontal detection.

tools.name: GEO-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Earth Monitoring Foundation Models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate foundation models for Earth monitoring tasks, facilitating the development of general-purpose geospatial AI.

tools.name: CA-SpaceNet
tools.one_line_profile: Counterfactual Analysis for 6D Pose Estimation in Space
tools.detailed_description: A method and codebase for 6D pose estimation of spacecraft using counterfactual analysis, applicable to space robotics and satellite servicing.

tools.name: RSTeller
tools.one_line_profile: Vision-Language Dataset for Remote Sensing
tools.detailed_description: A dataset designed for vision-language tasks in the remote sensing domain, facilitating image captioning and visual question answering.

tools.name: SpaceNet BuildingDetectors
tools.one_line_profile: Winning building footprint detectors from SpaceNet challenges
tools.detailed_description: A collection of winning algorithms and implementations for building footprint detection from the SpaceNet challenges.

tools.name: SpaceNet BuildingDetectors Round2
tools.one_line_profile: Building detectors from SpaceNet Challenge Round 2
tools.detailed_description: Algorithms and code for building detection from the second round of the SpaceNet Challenge.

tools.name: SpaceNet RoadDetector
tools.one_line_profile: Winning solutions for SpaceNet Road Detection and Routing Challenge
tools.detailed_description: Contains the winning algorithms and solutions for the SpaceNet Road Detection and Routing Challenge, focusing on extracting road networks from satellite imagery.

tools.name: SpaceNet8 Baseline
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithmic baseline for SpaceNet 8 Flood Detection Challenge
tools.detailed_description: Provides the official algorithmic baseline for the SpaceNet 8 Challenge, which focuses on flood detection and building extraction from pre- and post-event imagery.

tools.name: SpaceNet Off-Nadir Solutions
tools.one_line_profile: Winning algorithms for SpaceNet 4 Off-Nadir Building Detection
tools.detailed_description: Collection of winning solutions for the SpaceNet 4 Challenge, addressing building footprint detection in off-nadir (high angle) satellite imagery.

tools.name: SpaceNet SAR Solutions
tools.one_line_profile: Winning solutions for SpaceNet 6 SAR Building Detection
tools.detailed_description: Contains the winning models and code for the SpaceNet 6 Challenge, which focuses on extracting building footprints from Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) data.

tools.name: SpaceNet STAC Implementation
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for implementing STAC specification for SpaceNet datasets
tools.detailed_description: Provides utilities and notebooks to implement the SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog (STAC) specification for SpaceNet datasets, facilitating standardized metadata management.

tools.name: SpaceNet Utilities
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing packages for SpaceNet satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python packages and utilities designed to assist in the preprocessing of SpaceNet satellite imagery data into formats consumable by machine learning algorithms.

tools.name: GEO-Bench-VLM
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Vision-Language Models on geospatial tasks
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite designed to evaluate Vision-Language Models (VLMs) specifically on geospatial tasks, provided by The AI Alliance.

tools.name: R3Det_Tensorflow
tools.one_line_profile: Refined Single-Stage Detector for rotating object detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of R3Det (Refined Single-Stage Detector), a method designed for detecting rotating objects, which is critical for aerial and satellite imagery analysis.

tools.name: LS-SSDD-v1.0
tools.one_line_profile: Large-Scale SAR Ship Detection Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset for ship detection in SAR images (Sentinel-1), including ground truth labels verified by experts and AIS data.

tools.name: SAROS Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Sparsely Annotated Region and Organ Segmentation dataset
tools.detailed_description: A large, heterogeneous, and sparsely annotated segmentation dataset on CT imaging data for medical image analysis.

tools.name: 3DCD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for remote sensing elevation change detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning based tool for detecting changes in elevation (3D) using remote sensing data.

tools.name: Pangaea Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for Geospatial Foundation Models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool designed for the robust evaluation of geospatial foundation models across various tasks.

tools.name: SAMRS
tools.one_line_profile: Scaled-up Remote Sensing Segmentation Dataset using SAM
tools.detailed_description: Official repository for SAMRS, a large-scale remote sensing segmentation dataset generated using the Segment Anything Model (SAM) to scale up annotations.

tools.name: DRENet
tools.one_line_profile: Degraded Reconstruction Enhancement Network for ship detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DRENet, a network designed for tiny ship detection in remote sensing images, featuring degraded reconstruction enhancement.

tools.name: LEVIR-Ship
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for tiny ship detection in medium-resolution images
tools.detailed_description: Official release of the LEVIR-Ship dataset, specifically designed for training and evaluating models for tiny ship detection in medium-resolution remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: SAR-TEXT
tools.one_line_profile: Large-Scale SAR Image-Text Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset pairing SAR images with text descriptions, built using SAR-Narrator and progressive transfer learning for multimodal research.

tools.name: GeoBench
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for benchmarking geometry estimation models
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox designed for benchmarking state-of-the-art discriminative and generative geometry estimation models in geospatial contexts.

tools.name: rslearn
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for developing remote sensing datasets and models
tools.detailed_description: A library from AllenAI for developing, training, and evaluating remote sensing models and datasets.

tools.name: DSen2-CR
tools.one_line_profile: Network for removing clouds from Sentinel-2 images
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DSen2-CR, a deep learning network for cloud removal in Sentinel-2 satellite imagery, including pre-trained checkpoints.

tools.name: Road Visualizer
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for SpaceNet and DeepGlobe road datasets
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for visualizing road extraction results and datasets, modified from the SpaceNet visualizer to support DeepGlobe data.

tools.name: SSD SpaceNet
tools.one_line_profile: Single Shot MultiBox Detector for SpaceNet buildings
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the SSD (Single Shot MultiBox Detector) algorithm specifically adapted for detecting buildings in the SpaceNet satellite imagery dataset.

tools.name: CosmiQ SN7 Baseline
tools.one_line_profile: Official baseline algorithm for SpaceNet 7 Challenge
tools.detailed_description: The official baseline algorithm provided by CosmiQ Works for the SpaceNet 7 Challenge, serving as a reference implementation for tracking building footprints over time.

tools.name: SpaceNet Buildings Exploration
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for transforming SpaceNet building labels
tools.detailed_description: Python utilities for exploring and transforming SpaceNet building labels, provided by SpaceNet researchers.

tools.name: aitlas-arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for evaluating deep learning in Earth Observation
tools.detailed_description: An open-source benchmark framework designed for evaluating state-of-the-art deep learning approaches for image classification tasks within the Earth Observation (EO) domain.

tools.name: rscir
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset and implementation for Composed Image Retrieval in Remote Sensing
tools.detailed_description: Official PyTorch implementation and benchmark dataset for the task of Composed Image Retrieval (CIR) in remote sensing contexts.

tools.name: BTC-change-detection
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and codebase for Remote Sensing Change Detection practices
tools.detailed_description: Codebase accompanying the IEEE TGRS 2025 paper 'Be the Change You Want to See', providing a benchmark for revisiting and evaluating remote sensing change detection practices.

tools.name: SDM
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and code for Few-Shot Aerial Image Semantic Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Provides the iSAID-5i dataset and implementation for Scale-aware Detailed Matching (SDM) for few-shot semantic segmentation in aerial images.

tools.name: geobench
tools.one_line_profile: GeoGuessr-style benchmark for evaluating language models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the geospatial reasoning capabilities of language models, framed as a GeoGuessr task.

tools.name: HRSID
tools.one_line_profile: High-resolution SAR images dataset for ship detection and segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A dataset for ship detection, semantic segmentation, and instance segmentation tasks using high-resolution Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) images.

tools.name: VHR-10_dataset_coco
tools.one_line_profile: COCO-format annotations for NWPU VHR-10 and SSDD datasets
tools.detailed_description: Provides object detection and instance segmentation annotations in standard COCO format for the NWPU VHR-10 and SSDD remote sensing datasets.

tools.name: MTKD-CD
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset (JL1-CD) and framework for Remote Sensing Change Detection
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the JL1-CD benchmark for remote sensing change detection, including a Multi-Teacher Knowledge Distillation framework.

tools.name: MLRSNet
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-label High Spatial Resolution Remote Sensing Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A multi-label high spatial resolution remote sensing dataset designed for semantic scene understanding tasks.

tools.name: ISPRS_S2FL
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Remote Sensing Benchmark Datasets for Land Cover Classification
tools.detailed_description: Benchmark datasets for land cover classification using multimodal remote sensing data, supporting shared and specific feature learning models.

tools.name: RSE_Cross-city
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal Remote Sensing Benchmark Dataset for Cross-City Semantic Segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset for cross-city semantic segmentation using high-resolution domain adaptation networks in multimodal remote sensing.

tools.name: spacenet-data
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for setting up the SpaceNet dataset
tools.detailed_description: Scripts and utilities for downloading, setting up, and preparing the SpaceNet dataset for training segmentation models.

tools.name: HRPlanesv2-Data-Set
tools.one_line_profile: High-resolution satellite imagery dataset for aircraft detection
tools.detailed_description: A high-resolution satellite imagery dataset (HRPlanesv2) specifically curated for aircraft detection tasks, including benchmark results.

tools.name: Underwater-Acoustic-Target-Classification-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: Dense CNN implementation for underwater acoustic target recognition
tools.detailed_description: A Dense Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) implementation for underwater acoustic target classification using raw audio signals, designed for oceanic remote sensing.

tools.name: eotdl
tools.one_line_profile: Earth Observation Training Datasets Library
tools.detailed_description: A library and platform for accessing, managing, and utilizing Earth Observation (EO) training datasets for machine learning applications.

tools.name: small-object-detection-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for small object detection using SAHI
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating small object detection performance on datasets like VisDrone and xView using the SAHI (Slicing Aided Hyper Inference) framework.

tools.name: RSHI60T
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for rice seed hyperspectral image classification
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset specifically designed for the classification of rice seeds using hyperspectral imaging.

tools.name: Counting-from-Sky
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale dataset and benchmark for remote sensing object counting
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset and associated benchmark method for object counting tasks in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: RSUL
tools.one_line_profile: Large remote sensing unlabeled dataset for semi-supervised detection
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale unlabeled dataset designed for semi-supervised oriented object detection in remote sensing.

tools.name: DOTA_devkit_YOLO
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to convert DOTA OBB format to YOLO format
tools.detailed_description: A utility toolkit for converting DOTA dataset Oriented Bounding Box (OBB) annotations into the YOLO format for training object detection models.

tools.name: yolov5_obb
tools.one_line_profile: YOLOv5 implementation for Oriented Object Detection
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of YOLOv5 adapted for Oriented Object Detection (OBB), widely used for rotation detection in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: torchrs
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch library for remote sensing datasets and models
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library that provides implementations of popular datasets, models, and data loaders specifically for remote sensing applications.

tools.name: Faster_RCNN_for_DOTA
tools.one_line_profile: Faster R-CNN implementation for DOTA dataset
tools.detailed_description: A specific implementation of the Faster R-CNN object detection model adapted for the DOTA dataset (aerial images).

tools.name: BigEarthNet-Sen1
tools.one_line_profile: Pipelines for creating the BigEarthNet-Sen1 dataset
tools.detailed_description: Provides the data processing pipelines and tools used for the creation of the BigEarthNet-Sen1 remote sensing dataset.

tools.name: STANet
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial-temporal attention neural network for remote sensing image change detection
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of STANet, a deep learning model designed for change detection in remote sensing images using a spatial-temporal attention mechanism to capture multi-scale spatio-temporal dependencies.

tools.name: DSAMNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deeply supervised attention metric-based network for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DSAMNet, a deep learning model for change detection in aerial images, featuring a deeply supervised attention metric-based architecture to improve detection accuracy.

tools.name: REOBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for evaluating robustness of Earth Observation foundation models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool designed to evaluate the robustness and performance of various Earth Observation (EO) foundation models across different tasks and datasets.

tools.name: HSI-datasets
tools.one_line_profile: Python utility for loading hyperspectral remote sensing datasets
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that simplifies the downloading and loading of standard hyperspectral remote sensing scenes (e.g., Pavia University, Salinas) for machine learning research.

tools.name: xView2-Baseline
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline models for building localization and damage assessment
tools.detailed_description: Provides baseline image segmentation models and inference code for the xView2 challenge, focusing on building localization and damage assessment from satellite imagery.

tools.name: HR-RS-Segmentation-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation for high-resolution remote sensing semantic segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive PyTorch framework implementing various semantic segmentation models specifically optimized for high-resolution remote sensing imagery (land cover classification).

tools.name: SpaceNet Building Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for training and testing CNNs on SpaceNet building datasets
tools.detailed_description: A project providing code and workflows to train and evaluate Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) for extracting building footprints from SpaceNet satellite imagery.

tools.name: ScratchFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based remote sensing change detection model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of ScratchFormer, a transformer-based architecture trained from scratch for change detection in remote sensing images, offering an alternative to CNN-based methods.

tools.name: CropHarvest
tools.one_line_profile: Global dataset and benchmark library for crop monitoring
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and dataset for agricultural remote sensing, providing benchmarks for crop type classification and monitoring using satellite data.

tools.name: RS5M
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale vision-language dataset and codebase for remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: Provides the codebase and access to the RS5M dataset, a large-scale vision-language dataset designed for pre-training and evaluating multi-modal models in remote sensing.

tools.name: MagicBathyNet
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and dataset for satellite-derived bathymetry
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool and dataset for deriving bathymetry (water depth) from remote sensing imagery using deep learning methods.

tools.name: EuroSAT
tools.one_line_profile: Land Use and Land Cover Classification Dataset with Sentinel-2
tools.detailed_description: A dataset for land use and land cover classification based on Sentinel-2 satellite imagery, covering 13 spectral bands and 10 classes.

tools.name: BioMassters
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for predicting forest biomass from satellite imagery
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm and benchmark implementation for predicting yearly Aboveground Biomass for Finnish forests using satellite imagery, presented at NeurIPS 2023.

tools.name: cyclone-model-torchgeo
tools.one_line_profile: Tropical Cyclone Wind Estimation Model
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for estimating tropical cyclone wind speeds from satellite imagery, built using TorchGeo.

tools.name: deep-unet-for-satellite-image-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Deep UNet implementation for satellite image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Deep UNet for feature detection and segmentation in satellite imagery, specifically optimized for the SpaceNet dataset.

tools.name: ORSSD-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Optical Remote Sensing Salient Object Detection Dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dataset designed for salient object detection tasks in optical remote sensing images.

tools.name: Complex-Optical-Remote-Sensing-Aircraft-Detection-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for aircraft detection in complex optical remote sensing imagery
tools.detailed_description: A complex optical remote sensing aircraft dataset constructed from several satellites with varying imaging characteristics to support diverse aircraft detection tasks.

tools.name: rs-fusion-datasets
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for loading and benchmarking remote sensing fusion datasets
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit containing fetchers, loaders, and benchmarking utilities for Joint Classification of Hyperspectral and LiDAR/SAR Data.

tools.name: xviewer
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for SLAM and VIO datasets
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool for visualizing data files or directories from datasets such as EuROC and TUM VIO, useful for robotics and remote sensing navigation tasks.

tools.name: BenchCloudVision
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark analysis tool for cloud detection in remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of BenchCloudVision, providing a benchmark analysis of deep learning approaches for cloud detection and segmentation in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: TorchGeo
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch domain library for geospatial data
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch domain library providing datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models specifically designed for geospatial data.

tools.name: xview-yolov3
tools.one_line_profile: YOLOv3 implementation for xView object detection
tools.detailed_description: An adaptation of the YOLOv3 object detection model specifically configured for training and inference on the xView satellite imagery dataset.

tools.name: SkyScript
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale vision-language dataset for remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: A large and semantically diverse vision-language dataset for remote sensing, designed to support multi-modal learning tasks.

tools.name: SemiCD
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised change detection method for remote sensing
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a consistency regularization approach for semi-supervised change detection in remote sensing images.

tools.name: ddpm-cd
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion models for remote sensing change detection
tools.detailed_description: A method using Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPM) for change detection in remote sensing imagery.

tools.name: SAR_vehicle_detection_dataset
tools.one_line_profile: High-resolution SAR vehicle detection dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dataset for vehicle detection in high-resolution SAR images, collected from Sandia MiniSAR/FARAD and MSTAR images.

tools.name: PolSAR-semantic-segmentation-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for PolSAR image semantic segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A dataset used for PolSAR image semantic segmentation research, supporting deep transfer learning tasks.

tools.name: OLI2MSI
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for remote sensing super-resolution
tools.detailed_description: A dataset specifically designed for training and benchmarking remote sensing super-resolution algorithms.

tools.name: rschange
tools.one_line_profile: Remote sensing change detection framework
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of change detection methods for remote sensing images, associated with ICME2024 and JSTARS2025 publications.

tools.name: GSNet
tools.one_line_profile: Open-vocabulary remote sensing image semantic segmentation model
tools.detailed_description: Code and dataset repository for GSNet, a method designed for open-vocabulary semantic segmentation in remote sensing images. It addresses the challenge of segmenting objects with arbitrary categories, including those not seen during training, by leveraging generalized semantic features.

tools.name: UAV-Highway-Crack-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for highway crack segmentation from UAV images
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset specifically designed for the segmentation of highway cracks using images captured by Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs). It supports the development and evaluation of deep learning models for automated infrastructure inspection and maintenance.

tools.name: So2Sat-LCZ42
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for global Local Climate Zones (LCZ) classification
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale benchmark dataset for the classification of Local Climate Zones (LCZ). It consists of co-registered Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 image patches covering various urban areas globally, designed to support research in urban climate analysis and remote sensing classification.
